author: Ping He, Qi Wang, Mengjie Wang, Ting Wang, Tong Ruan, Ju Gao and Yichao Yin

resources.description:
We crawled symptom names from the symptom list pages of 8 mainstream health information websites. They are:

* 39Health: http://jbk.39.net/bw_t2/
* 123ask: http://tag.120ask.com/zhengzhuang/
* Familydoctor: http://jbk.familydoctor.com.cn/
* Fh21: http://zzk.fh21.com.cn/
* jianke: http://www.jianke.com/zhengzhuang/
* PCbaby: http://health.pcbaby.com.cn/zz/
* qqyy: http://zz.qqyy.com/
* xywy: http://zzk.xywy.com/

The symptom dataset contains __14,707 symptom names__.
resources.name: Symptoms crawled from websites

resources.description: We distantly annotated 120,000 sentences from Baidu Baike as the training data for our CRF model. Each symptom with its start index and end index was annotated after the sentence.
resources.name: Training data for distant supervision from Baidu Baike

name: chinesesymptomnamerecognition
notes:
This dataset contains the training data for distant supervision from Baidu Baike used in the paper named Combining Distant Supervision with Syntax-based Rules for Chinese Symptom Names Recognition in Electronic Medical Records.

We also make a __demo__ for our method to recognize Chinese symptom from texts. The demo URL is http://dsc.nlp-bigdatalab.org:8090/recognition.html
title: ChineseSymptomNameRecognition
